actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to restore reliability to the medical justice system by fostering alternatives to current medical tort litigation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Reliable Medical Justice Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award up to seven demonstration grants to States for the development, implementation, and evaluation of alternatives to current tort litigation for resolving disputes over injuries allegedly caused by health care providers or health care organizations.

titles.title: A bill to restore reliability to the medical justice system by fostering alternatives to current medical tort litigation, and for other purposes.
